sentences.en: "Morris" is an English corruption of "Moorish", meaning North African.
sentences.cn: Morris在英语中是Moorish的变体，意思是“北非的”。

sentences.en: A point of order was raised in parliament by Mr Ben Morris.
sentences.cn: 本·莫里斯先生在议会就程序问题提出质询。

sentences.en: For years he pursued a vendetta against the Morris family.
sentences.cn: 多年来他一直在寻求向莫里斯家族报世仇.

sentences.en: Morris executed a suite of twelve drawings in 1978.
sentences.cn: 莫里斯在1978年创作了由12幅画组成的一组作品。

sentences.en: Morris extended his empty hands with a melancholy smile.
sentences.cn: 莫里斯带着忧郁的笑容摊开双手.

sentences.en: Morris had pleaded guilty to robbery.
sentences.cn: 莫里斯已承认犯有抢劫罪。

sentences.en: Morris has now banished all thoughts of retirement.
sentences.cn: 莫里斯现在已经打消了退休的所有念头。

sentences.en: Morris ignored the question and continued his monologue.
sentences.cn: 莫里斯不理会这个问题，继续他的长篇大论。

sentences.en: Morris intended to foster an art restoring the dignity of the craftsman.
sentences.cn: 莫里斯的目的在于扶植一种能恢复手工艺工人威望的艺术.

sentences.en: Morris was so stunned by this that he experienced a moment of total disorientation.
sentences.cn: 莫里斯因此大为震惊，以致一度无所适从。

sentences.en: Mr Morris feels the museum is using advertising to good effect.
sentences.cn: 莫里斯先生认为博物馆作的广告卓有成效。

sentences.en: Mr Morris was determined to put on a show of family unity.
sentences.cn: 莫里斯先生决心摆出一副家庭团结的样子。

sentences.en: This phenomenon piqued Dr Morris' interest.
sentences.cn: 这一现象激起了莫里斯医生的兴趣。

sentences.en: Upstage and right of centre, Robert Morris stands with his back to the audience.
sentences.cn: 舞台后方偏右处，罗伯特·莫里斯背对观众站着。

phrases.tran_cn: 菲利普莫里斯（公司总部设于美国，主要经营烟草食品？

trans.tran_cn: 莫理斯舞（英国传统民间舞蹈，舞者通常为男子，身上系铃，扮民间传说中的人物）
